name: Brutal State (Singleplayer FPS Campaign)
description:
Brutal State is a classic style FPS game that will take you through 5 levels where you will battle demons that have taken over earth. You will get your hands on 4 weapons to fight a variety of enemies. Can you save the world? I guess we will find out!

Controls

Movement - WASD

Sprint- Shift

Reload - R

Flashlight - F (Not recommended on bright levels)

Known bugs

Loading screens take a long time, enemies can get stuck, comment below if you find anything else 

Check out my youtube channel GamingZoom
